name: Lightbringer (JJ & Friends!)
description:
A procedurally-generated roguelike set in a haunted dungeon.

Made for Godot Wild Jam #52. The theme was "Ghosts". I used the "Multiple Difficulty Levels" and "Find Your Way in the Dark" wildcards.

  • Controls: WASD or Arrow Keys to move. Control to open/close menu. Spacebar to use keys.
  • Accessibility features: Two movement options (left- and right-handed), simple controls, high-contrast colors, high-contrast text, large font size

I made everything myself, except:

  • Includes the song "Hymn To The Dawn" (CC BY 4.0)  by Scott Buckley, https://www.scottbuckley.com.au/
  • Other music and SFX are royalty-free from Pixabay, then mixed together by me

I also got inspiration from the following sources:

  • This Godot limited vision tutorial for navigating in the darkness
  • A really fun game from GWJ #50 called "The Magician RL"
  • The Lord of the Rings (The Valley of the Dead and The Phial of Galadriel)

Made with Godot Engine
